attributes.heading: User Experience
attributes.text: I am known for my drive to simplify the user experience and map actions to the results that are desired.

attributes.heading: Delivering Quality
attributes.text: As a product manager I worked with all levels of business to succeed in product development. Quality starts with the right business goals and continues with code maintainability.

attributes.heading: Love of Learning
attributes.text: I am always looking to learn new skills. E-learning combines my web development skills with my interest in user experience and love for learning.
